column4: hi, does anyone know how to get flash on ubuntu 10.04 on 64bit?
it says there's no such file or directory whenever I downloaded it and typed the command into the terminal
the file should be in your home folder, make sure that your running the command from your home directory.
it's alright, got it working lol
dunno yet, it's doing something in the terminal, will let that finish
it's not working for me either. I have Ubuntu 10.04 64-bit and I'm trying to get flash working as well. I wanted to see whether the fix that didn't work for me worked for you.
ok, I'll ask my brother about it later, I think he updated too and has flash
well I'll keep looking too, good luck with getting it working.
my brother updated his ubuntu 10.4 with 64bit and apparently his flash never broke, dunno what's wrong lol
flash has always been a problem for me.
haven't found any ways of getting flash yet, you had any luck?
I have been playing the PS3 so no I haven't.
you may call me a genius, I fixed the problem
lol xD go to Ubuntu Software Centre and search "flash" then just install the Adobe Flash Plugin
